# Direct Democracy
Much of my research has focused on direct democraqcy and other forms of political participation. I worked as a researcher for many years at the leading centre for the study of direct democracy, the [c2d](http://c2d.ch). Presently, I am involved in an interdisciplinary European Research Council project -[LIDD](https://www.ivr.uzh.ch/en/institutsmitglieder/moeckli/Research-project-LIDD.html)- that focuses on the limits of direct democracy. Below I list a sample of earlier work and ongoing research.
